text: Dear Sir/Madam, I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you that there has been a recent security breach in our system. Please follow the link below and enter your login credentials to secure your account. http://maliciouswebsite.com

Hi there, I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to share a new product with you that I think would be of great interest to you. Please follow the link below to learn more. http://legitimatewebsite.com
Dear customer, Your account has been locked for security reasons. Please follow the link below to unlock your account. http://maliciouswebsite.com
Hello, I wanted to share a new opportunity with you that I think would be of great benefit. Please follow the link below to learn more. http://legitimatewebsite.com
Dear user, We have noticed suspicious activity on your account. Please follow the link below and enter your login credentials to secure your account. http://maliciouswebsite.com
